author: Roberto Jiménez
title: La audiencia dicta sentencia al estreno de 'MasterChef Junior 11' en TVE con una queja muy repetida
text:
Tras triunfar en Nochebuena y Navidad, TVE estrenaba este jueves la undécima edición de 'MasterChef Junior' con la intención de mantener la buena racha en prime time.
Una edición del talent de cocina que llega además con una triple entrega semanal pues La 1 ha optado por emitir el programa también en la noche del viernes y del domingo emitiendo así sus tres primeras entregas en esta primera semana de navidad.
Sophie, Marcos, Nikole, Candela, Leo, Lucía, Nacho, Daniela, Nico, Valentina, Marce, Martina, Paco, Constancia, Fernando y Ana son los dieciséis pequeños que este año vivirán la mejor aventura de sus vidas como aspirantes de 'MasterChef Junior'.
El trabajo en equipo, el esfuerzo y la pasión por la cocina serán requisitos indispensables. El jurado, integrado por Pepe Rodríguez, Samantha Vallejo-Nágera y Jordi Cruz, valorará a los aspirantes, que irán sumando puntos y, al final de cada programa, los que hayan obtenido la menor puntuación dirán adiós a esta aventura. El ganador obtendrá el trofeo del talent, 12.000 euros en metálico para su formación, un curso de cocina de cuatro días en el Basque Culinary Center y, gracias al patrocinador del programa, se llevará una beca formativa BBVA.
El público carga contra TVE por el horario de 'MasterChef Junior'
'MasterChef Junior 11' ha arrancado este jueves a las 22:55 horas tras una reposición de 'La Revuelta' de Broncano. Esto ha provocado la ira de muchos de los espectadores por relegar un formato infantil a este horario.
Pero además otra de las quejas más repetidas sobre el estreno de 'MasterChef Junior 11' es sobre el casting del formato de Shine Iberia. Así, son muchos los que cuestionan una vez más lo "repelentes" que son los niños concursantes mientras otros no dudan en señalar que se nota que son hijos de gente "rica".
Sigue toda la información de El Televisero desde Facebook,
X
o
Instagram

author: Maya Lanzone
title: ‘Get your prices under control,’ blasts Goodwill shopper as thrift store charges nearly 25% more than Kohl’s
text:
Money Retail PRICE PROTEST ‘Get your prices under control,’ blasts Goodwill shopper as thrift store charges nearly 25% more than Kohl’s Another Goodwill customer confronted a store manager over an overpriced item Maya Lanzone , Consumer Reporter Published : 17:00 ET, Aug 15 2024 Updated : 17:03 ET, Aug 15 2024 A THRIFTER was taken back after spotting a price hike on a dress at the secondhand store.
The new dress was marked up from its retail price , costing nearly 25% more than it would have if the Goodwill shopper bought it at Kohl's.
3 Despite being a thrift store, some Goodwill items are priced the same as retail or even higher Credit: Getty 3 One Goodwill customer was shocked to see a dress marked 25% more than it was selling for at Kohl's Credit: Getty Goodwill shopper Nikita ( @emotionalindividual ) shares thrifting content with her Instagram followers.
The thrifter posted footage of a Goodwill price tag that caught her off guard in a viral video last month that has now racked up over 10 million views.
Nikita showed an iridescent dress with hanging sequins originally from Kohl's.
The dress was brand new and still had its tags, revealing its original price of $68.
Read More on Goodwill
FAB FIND I found a $7 top buried in the Goodwill rack - turns out it's worth $580
BAD WILL Goodwill customers slam high costs, saying prices are 'like a department store' Kohl's had marked down the dress by 90% to $6.80.
Nikita pulled over the Goodwill tag to reveal the thrift store had marked up the dress's price by nearly 25% to $8.99.
3 Goodwill was charging $8.99 for a dress retailing for just $6.80 Credit: Instagram/emotionalindividual "Goodwill you HAVE to be KIDDING ME," she wrote in the text overlay.
"On clearance was cheaper than at Goodwill," fumed Nikita in the video's caption.
Most read in Money
SQUEAKY CLEAN DEAL Dollar Tree's home essential is all the rave for $20 less than Walmart's
SCARY SHOPPING Walmart customers slam new store layout - say aisles are a 'nightmare' now
WAL-WOE Walmart shoppers forced to leave $200 grocery cart after self-checkout fiasco
BIG WINDFALL I kept my aunt's mobile in storage for decades - then I learned it's worth $2m "PLEASE get your prices under control. This is contributing to the fashion problem when it doesn’t sell and heads to a landfill."
Other Goodwill shoppers backed up the content creator and critiqued the secondhand store's pricing structure.
I found an $8.70 jacket in a bin at Goodwill – initials in a pocket revealed its famous owner & it’s now worth $25,000 "That happens all the time," wrote one Instagram user. "Refuse to buy that stuff even if I love it because it’s just wrong."
Although several shoppers blamed resellers for Goodwill's price increases, many attributed it to corporate greed.
"Everyone's mad at resellers and not Goodwill - a major corporation that gets their products for FREE, so it's not like their 'supply' is increasing in price," bashed one thrifter.
"They are GREEDY. Goodwill's CEO made almost $500k last year... Let's look at the real issue."
COST CLASH Another Goodwill shopper confronted a store manager after spotting an overpriced candle.
The shopper saw a used candle that the thrift store was asking $4 for.
"Who the hell is going to put $4 on a candle that's burnt down like that?" she said to a worker, who proceeded to grab a manager.
"How are you guys going to put $4 on a candle that's a quarter full and burned and old as sh** from probably a dollar store," blasted the thrifter once the manager arrived.
The manager said he meant to change the price yesterday, but the shopper retorted she constantly saw overpriced items.
Valuable thrifting finds revealed Here are some of the best thrift store finds:
Tiffany & Co. earrings that sold for $0.34 and are valued at $430 American Girl doll that sold for $5.99 and is valued at $300 Bionicle toy that sold for $14.95 and is valued at $18.101 Gold record plaque for DJ Quik's 1992 album Way 2 Fonky that sold for @20 and is valued at $200 Rothy's brand Sugared Berry pointed-toe flats that sold for $155 retail and are valued at $250 The Goodwill customer called the store's prices a "complete ripoff" and advised its employees to pay closer attention to how they priced items.
She ultimately left the store empty-handed and was followed by the manager who thanked her for speaking up.
"I said, 'I'm in here all the time and I'm usually not that one to complain and say sh** but enough is enough,'" she recounted.
"'I've been coming in here a long time and to see prices on candles that are half burnt, and dust filled from a f***ing dollar store that is $3.99 or more is absolutely ridiculous.'"
Higher prices are hitting shoppers outside the thrift store as well.
Read More on The US Sun
BIDEN BURN Biden brands Trump 'Donald Dump' at first joint Harris rally since dropping out
DRUG DEATH Matthew Perry’s assistant & two docs among 5 charged in actor's overdose death Costco shoppers have weeks left to renew their memberships before the $10 price hikes – the exact day to sign up before it’s too late.
Plus, shoppers fear Cheez-It and Pringles prices will rise after candy giant Mars bought the companies in a $36 billion deal.

author: SportLife
title: Sobremesa da hipertrofia: 4 frutas para ganhar massa muscular
text:
Compartilhar notícia
Google News - Metrópoles
Eliminar o máximo de gordura e ter músculos fortes e bonitos para mostrar é um dos objetivos mais comuns do mundo fitness. No entanto, nem todos têm sucesso nessa busca. Por isso, é sempre importante apostar em métodos para facilitar o caminho como, por exemplo, incluir uma sobremesa saudável na dieta.
Não é novidade que, para garantir a hipertrofia, ou seja, o ganho de massa muscular, é necessário um conjunto de ações. O seu treino precisa estar em dia, assim como o descanso e a alimentação. E é, justamente na hora de comer, que muitos escorregam. Afinal, quem tem o objetivo de “colocar o shape”, não costuma faltar na academia.
No entanto, a nutrição, geralmente, é o que atrapalha a conquista dos resultados, já que ela exige controle e atenção durante todo o dia. Basta um ou outro deslize para que o seu progresso seja interrompido. Dessa forma, para evitar que isso aconteça, é importante fugir de grandes restrições.
Uuma saída simples e eficiente é apostar em frutas anabólicas. Elas, além de saudáveis e importantes para a hipertrofia, vão garantir um paladar doce e diferente para a dieta, funcionando como uma espécie de sobremesa saudável.
Dessa maneira, com a ajuda do nutricionista Rubens Gomes, separamos quatro opções de frutas anabólicas. Afinal, anabolizantes não são, necessariamente, produtos químicos e proibidos, mas, sim, tudo aquilo que favorece o aumento de massa magra. Confira:
Quer uma sobremesa saudável e anabólica? Aposte nessas frutas:
1 – Abacate
Classificado como um superalimento, o abacate é uma ótima fonte de gorduras do bem. E isso é fundamental para melhorar a produção natural de testosterona — hormônio decisivo para o ganho de massa muscular. Segundo o nutricionista Rubens, o ideal é consumir a fruta antes de dormir, para favorecer a sintetização dos hormônios anabólicos durante o sono.
2 – Mamão
Assim como o abacaxi, o mamão reserva diversas vantagens para o organismo. Uma delas é a melhora do trato gastrointestinal, que alivia a prisão de ventre. “A papaína [substância encontrada no mamão] atua como um laxativo. Com isso, você não fica com aquele aspecto de dilatação abdominal”, afirma Rubens. Isso é uma característica que facilita a ingestão e a absorção de outros nutrientes e, por isso, o mamão é considerado uma boa opção de fruta para ganhar massa muscular.
Confira a lista completa no portal SportLife, parceiro do Metrópoles.
Siga a editoria de Saúde e Ciência no Instagram e no Canal do Whatsapp e fique por dentro de tudo sobre o assunto!

author: Daniel Strauss and Kristen Holmes
title: Republican National Committee considering move that would declare Trump the presumptive nominee
text:
(CNN) — A draft resolution circulating among the Republican National Committee would formally declare Donald Trump the Republican Party’s 2024 presumptive nominee.
While the former president would still need to reach the delegate requirements necessary to win the nomination, if the resolution is approved, he would have access to the RNC’s data operation, benefit from fundraising with the RNC, and have the support of all of the committee’s ground operations. It would also mean the committee would be supporting Trump and effectively opposing former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley – an unprecedented break from the party’s past approach to the nominating process.
The resolution, which is being reviewed by the RNC, was proposed by David Bossie, an RNC committeeman from Maryland who recently endorsed Trump. The resolution was first reported by The Dispatch on Thursday. A draft copy of the resolution was obtained independently by CNN.
“RESOLVED that the Republican National Committee hereby declares President Trump as our presumptive 2024 nominee for the office of President of the United States and from this moment forward moves into full general election mode welcoming supporters of all candidates as valued members of Team Trump 2024,” the resolution reads.
An RNC spokesperson declined to comment.
The Haley campaign brushed off the resolution and said GOP Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel should organize a debate ahead of the South Carolina primary at the end of February.

author: Santi Delgado
title: Muere una niña de 3 años al caer el coche en el que viajaba al río Ebro
text:
Una tragedia ha sacudido este miércoles la localidad tarraconense de Roquetes tras precipitarse un vehículo al canal del río Ebro con cuatro ocupantes a bordo. El suceso, ocurrido alrededor de las 17.00 horas, se ha saldado con la muerte de una niña de 3 años que quedó atrapada en el interior del automóvil sumergido.
Otro menor de 5 años ha resultado herido grave y ha sido trasladado de urgencia al hospital Joan XXIII de Tarragona, mientras que la conductora y un tercer ocupante, un niño de 11 años, lograron salir por su propio pie del vehículo.
Según han confirmado fuentes próximas a la investigación, los servicios de emergencia recibieron la alerta sobre las 17:00 horas. Hasta el lugar de los hechos se desplazaron rápidamente efectivos de los Bomberos de la Generalitat, agentes de los Mossos d'Esquadra y dotaciones de la Policía Local de Roquetes.
A su llegada, comprobaron que tres de los cuatro ocupantes habían conseguido abandonar el vehículo, pero la pequeña de 3 años permanecía atrapada en el interior.
Los equipos de buceo de los bomberos realizaron las labores de rescate logrando extraer a la menor, que fue atendida in situ por el Sistema de Emergencias Médicas (SEM), aunque lamentablemente no pudieron salvar su vida.
La investigación sobre las causas del siniestro continúa abierta
Por el momento, las autoridades mantienen abiertas todas las hipótesis sobre las causas que provocaron que el vehículo se precipitara al canal. Los Mossos d'Esquadra han tomado el mando de la investigación y están recabando testimonios de posibles testigos, además de analizar las características del tramo donde se produjo el siniestro. Entre las posibilidades que se barajan están un fallo mecánico, una distracción al volante o algún problema en la vía que pudiera haber contribuido al accidente.
Consternats per la mort d'una xiqueta de
— Jordi Jordan (@JordiJordanEbre)[#Tortosa]a l'accident d'esta tarda a[#Roquetes]. El meu condol i de[@Tortosa]
a familiars i amistats. DEP[https://t.co/BQrDc4SBPJ][April 9, 2025]
El alcalde de Tortosa, municipio vecino de donde al parecer era originaria la familia, Jordi Jordan, ha manifestado su consternación a través de su cuenta en la red social X: "Estamos consternados por la muerte de una niña de Tortosa en el accidente de esta tarde en Roquetes. Mi pésame y el de Tortosa a familiares y amigos".
El suceso ha generado una honda conmoción en toda la comarca del Baix Ebre, donde vecinos han expresado su solidaridad con la familia afectada.

author: USCCB
title: Feast of the Visitation of the Blessed Virgin Mary
text:
Shout for joy, O daughter Zion!
Sing joyfully, O Israel!
Be glad and exult with all your heart,
O daughter Jerusalem!
The LORD has removed the judgment against you,
he has turned away your enemies;
The King of Israel, the LORD, is in your midst,
you have no further misfortune to fear.
On that day, it shall be said to Jerusalem:
Fear not, O Zion, be not discouraged!
The LORD, your God, is in your midst,
a mighty savior;
He will rejoice over you with gladness,
and renew you in his love,
He will sing joyfully because of you,
as one sings at festivals.
Or
Rom 12:9-16
Brothers and sisters:
Let love be sincere;
hate what is evil,
hold on to what is good;
love one another with mutual affection;
anticipate one another in showing honor.
Do not grow slack in zeal,
be fervent in spirit,
serve the Lord.
Rejoice in hope,
endure in affliction,
persevere in prayer.
Contribute to the needs of the holy ones,
exercise hospitality.
Bless those who persecute you,
bless and do not curse them.
Rejoice with those who rejoice,
weep with those who weep.
Have the same regard for one another;
do not be haughty but associate with the lowly;
do not be wise in your own estimation.
Daily Readings
Feast of the Visitation of the Blessed Virgin Mary
Lectionary: 572
Reading I
Shout for joy, O daughter Zion!
Responsorial Psalm
R. (6) Among you is the great and Holy One of Israel.
God indeed is my savior;
I am confident and unafraid.
My strength and my courage is the LORD,
and he has been my savior.
With joy you will draw water
at the fountain of salvation.
R. Among you is the great and Holy One of Israel.
Give thanks to the LORD, acclaim his name;
among the nations make known his deeds,
proclaim how exalted is his name.
R. Among you is the great and Holy One of Israel.
Sing praise to the LORD for his glorious achievement;
let this be known throughout all the earth.
Shout with exultation, O city of Zion,
for great in your midst
is the Holy One of Israel!
R. Among you is the great and Holy One of Israel.
Alleluia
R. Alleluia, alleluia.
Blessed are you, O Virgin Mary, who believed
that what was spoken to you by the Lord would be fulfilled.
R. Alleluia, alleluia.
Gospel
Mary set out
and traveled to the hill country in haste
to a town of Judah,
where she entered the house of Zechariah
and greeted Elizabeth.
When Elizabeth heard Mary’s greeting,
the infant leaped in her womb,
and Elizabeth, filled with the Holy Spirit,
cried out in a loud voice and said,
“Most blessed are you among women,
and blessed is the fruit of your womb.
And how does this happen to me,
that the mother of my Lord should come to me?
For at the moment the sound of your greeting reached my ears,
the infant in my womb leaped for joy.
Blessed are you who believed
that what was spoken to you by the Lord
would be fulfilled.”
And Mary said:
“My soul proclaims the greatness of the Lord;
my spirit rejoices in God my Savior,
for he has looked with favor on his lowly servant.
From this day all generations will call me blessed:
the Almighty has done great things for me,
and holy is his Name.
He has mercy on those who fear him
in every generation.
He has shown the strength of his arm,
he has scattered the proud in their conceit.
He has cast down the mighty from their thrones,
and has lifted up the lowly.
He has filled the hungry with good things,
and the rich he has sent away empty.
He has come to the help of his servant Israel
for he has remembered his promise of mercy,
the promise he made to our fathers,
to Abraham and his children for ever.”
Mary remained with her about three months
and then returned to her home.
Lectionary for Mass for Use in the Dioceses of the United States, second typical edition, Copyright © 2001, 1998, 1997, 1986, 1970 Confraternity of Christian Doctrine; Psalm refrain © 1968, 1981, 1997, International Committee on English in the Liturgy, Inc.
